TOOLTIPS.CREATION_USER: ID of the user of the creation
TOOLTIPS.MODIFICATION_USER: ID of the user of the last change

TOOLTIPS.DISPLAY_NAME: This name is used in list view.
TOOLTIPS.SCOPE_IS_PUBLIC: If checked, the Bookmark is visible to everyone in the workspace (public).
TOOLTIPS.ENDPOINT: The name of the app endpoint that the Bookmark points to.
TOOLTIPS.ENDPOINT_PARAMETER: A specific parameter of the endpoint which expect a value.
TOOLTIPS.QUERY: Additional information that can be further processed on the server or client side.
TOOLTIPS.FRAGMENT: Reference to an area (resource) on the target page (anchor link). Used on the client side to navigate to the area.
TOOLTIPS.TYPE_URL: Static URL to target maybe also outside of the Workspace. Loaded in separate TAB
TOOLTIPS.TYPE_PRODUCT: URL to endpoint of an Application within the current Workspace
TOOLTIPS.URL_SEARCH: Final URL which is used as target link

TOOLTIPS.ENDPOINT: The Endpoint targeted by the Bookmark and its parameters.
TOOLTIPS.PARAMS: Additional parameters added to the path

BOOKMARK_DELETE.MESSAGE: Do you want to delete this Bookmark?

BOOKMARK_EXPORT.INFO: Select the areas whose Bookmarks you want to export.

BOOKMARK_IMPORT.INFO: After importing, you will find all imported Bookmarks in your area.

SNAPSHOT.DATE.TOOLTIP: The time at which the file was created.

TOOLTIPS.CONTENT: List the content of the read file

IMAGE.UPLOAD_FAIL: The file could not be uploaded.
IMAGE.REMOVE_FAIL: The file could not be removed.
IMAGE.CONSTRAINT_FILE_TYPE: The following image formats are accepted: jpg, jpeg, png
IMAGE.CONSTRAINT_NAME: Please add a Workspace name before uploading a file.
IMAGE.CONSTRAINT_SIZE: The image file size exceeds the maximum length of 100,000 bytes.

TOOLTIPS.URL: As an alternative to uploading, a URL to an image can be specified here.

HTTP_STATUS_0.BOOKMARKS: Unknown problem retrieving Bookmark data - please try again.

HTTP_STATUS_400.BOOKMARKS: Your request could not be processed.
